member.name: Petethegoat
member.bio: Born in 'Nam, John Murder swiftly excelled at murderin' folk. Now John is a key member of Wild Hogs Inc.

mission.description: Get the balls and throw them in the vague direction of robots of different color.
mission.AAR: Lots of balls and lots of blowing. Success.

member.name: Pinky
member.remark: The shadows hide the deadly panther
member.bio: Ever since her infamous brother, Declan, introduced the No Girls Allowed rule on their shared treehouse, Ivy has been trying to break into places undetected, eventually getting very good at stealth. Now she works in WildHogs' intelligence department.

member.name: An0n3
member.remark: kawaii in the streets, sempai in the sheets
member.bio: Biff inherited the secret martial art of Punch Punching from his father and now puts his combat prowess to use for the Wild Hogs. Strangely, nobody has ever seen him actually punch anyone on the battlefield.

member.name: K-64
member.bio: Frank wears a kilt, and kills people.

member.name: Upgradecap
member.bio: After being unceremoniously fired from the Swedish airforce, John joined the Wild Hogs as a multirole operator. His specialities include: Removing Kebab, flying helicopters and blowing things up. John also loves to watch old action movies and feel like a hero.

member.name: Errorage
member.bio: After being run over by friendly forces on sixteen different occasions in Afghanistan, Ryan decided to contract with us.

mission.description: Get the burrito from the local burrito store and don't tip.
mission.AAR: The mission was a horrible failure. The retrieved burrito was COLD! The operator has received a heavy pay deduction to compensate.

mission.description: As part of the initiation, every operative must perform a FLASHSTAB operation.
mission.AAR: Perfectly performed. The operative was admitted as a full member after this operation.

member.name: Neerti
member.bio: Due to an incident involving a mortar shell colliding with a friendly helicopter, Ellis has decided to work for us, with the side benefit of hiding him when needed.
member.nationality: United States, Earth, Sol, Milky Way, Known Universe, Pete's Mind
member.birthday: Whenever it gets me free stuff.

mission.description: Steal a green floppydisk from a corporate building.

objective.outcomedetails: Slipped on a wet floor, lost the floppy.

mission.AAR: Horrible failure, the employees attempted to murder him after he fell due to wearing his operator uniform. He escaped alive but lost the disk somewhere along the way.

member.name: Miggles
member.bio: A former celebrity known for beatboxing, Aaron has joined the Wild Hogs to muck up the place and make everyone jealous of his sick shades.

member.name: Zack
member.remark: wyzeguy or something fuck i dunno it's hard to come up with these

member.name: Nienhaus
member.remark: wyzeguy or something fuck i dunno it's hard to come up with these

mission.description: We are red, they are blue. Red superiority demands that we destroy all the halls.
mission.AAR: BLUE TEAM WORST TEAM, RED TEAM SUPERIOR TEAM.

operative.contributions: Ryan kicked ass, because he is good at knighting.
John was killing people left and right and all over the place, cause he's a hero.

mission.description: The world has ended, and everything is steampunk airships. We were given the objective to stay alive at all costs, even if it meant losing our lives! Also we had to stay in a certain area for a certain amount of time, cuz that's a great plan for survival!

objectives.objective: Fire at and kill all airships that fly a different color

screenshot.caption: The deck in perfect condition... for a junker
Pete and his rock re enacting that one scene from the Titanic

mission.AAR: We survived. The same cannot be said for our enemies.

operative.contributions: Pete's engineering and gunnery are a great combination.
Marza took charge like a motherfucker and told us what to do, and we fucking done did it, and we fucking won.

mission.description: A friendly re-enactment of a famous battle.

screenshot.caption: Sergeant Pete and ensign Danno advance on a position that should never have been lost
Danno proves himself a hero by rushing into the building Pete is getting killed in

mission.AAR: During this re-enactment of some battle or other, which is apparently super important or something - a re-enactment that involved real swords, real bullets and real death - Pete, Jordie, Danno and Erro held their own... poorly...

operative.contributions: Pete's engineering and gunnery are a great combination.

testamonial.description: Wild Hogs Inc. helped me get my bitch ex-wife off my back! Thanks, Hogs!
testamonial.author: Jimbo

testamonial.description: When I needed a group of hardened ex or pre-military operators, I didn't know where to turn! Thankfully I found Wild Hogs while searching for discount pharmacuticals!
testamonial.author: Lard Wysing

testamonial.description: Joining Wild Hogs Inc. gave me the confidence I needed to kick my meth habit! Now I barely ever get high during the line of duty!
testamonial.author: John Murder

testamonial.description: B'Elanna is of the female race
testamonial.author: Myroc 2014

video.author: An0n3
